name: CleanTab
description: This extension allows you to specify a background image and a city's weather for displaying it in every new tab
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'sha256-PFTE+bhnUk6rwF2Mo6frY6domV+nlhj0VJSRkcFVIeo='; object-src 'self'; default-src 'self' https://api.pexels.com/v1/ https://api.pexels.com/v1/* https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/ https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/* https://fonts.googleapis.com/ https://fonts.gstatic.com/; img-src *; media-src *; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cse.google.com https://www.google.com/ https://fonts.googleapis.com/* https://fonts.gstatic.com/* https://unpkg.com/* https://fonts.googleapis.com/
